l1_gloss_long: A general friendly greeting used any time of day
A simple farewell used when leaving
Phrase used to state your name
Question asking about country or city of origin
Phrase to say which place/country you come from
Short answer when you feel okay
Short answer when you feel bad or tired
A person you know well and like
Place where you work or your job
Place where people buy food and goods
Verb for moving from one place to another
Verb for moving towards the speaker
Verb for talking with your mouth
Verb for when something makes sense to you
Verb for when you enjoy or prefer something
Verb for when you desire something
Verb for running with your legs
Adjective describing a person of high height
Generic concept for reviewing daily-life language
Generic concept for reviewing people/places language
Used to get attention or lightly apologise
